verses.roman:
āra eka śakti prabhu karila prakāśa
eka-kāle sāta ṭhāñi karila vilāsa

synonyms: āra—another; eka—one; śakti—mystic power; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karila—made; prakāśa—manifest; eka-kāle—simultaneously; sāta ṭhāñi—in seven places; karila—performed; vilāsa—pastimes.
translation: Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu then exhibited another mystic power by performing pastimes simultaneously in all seven groups.
